    • Uses of AbstractJTAEntityManagerTest in com.martinandersson.javaee.jpa.entitymanagers.containermanaged

      Subclasses of AbstractJTAEntityManagerTest in com.martinandersson.javaee.jpa.entitymanagers.containermanaged 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractContainerManagedEntityManagerTest
      This class has all tests that is applicable to container-managed entity managers, independent of the persistence context's type of synchronization or type of scope.
      class  ExtendedTest
      The persistence context of an container-managed entity manager may be extended (for application-managed entity managers, the persistence context is always extended).
      class  TransactionScopedTest
      Container-managed entity managers may have a persistence context that is scoped to the current/active JTA transaction1.
